favourite.article: Majestic and so beautiful. I am using it for a funeral tomorrow.
This hymn lifts my spirit everytime; right from the first time I heard it over two decades now. God bless the people He inspires to write these ageless hymns and we who sing them with great joy.
Thank you for words that we often battle to express ourselves. They help us realize the wonder of our Lord, the power of His might and the depth of His love for us. We praise His name!
..All laud we would render Ooh help (me)us to see... You are Lord...and beyond my all...I worship You.
What a glorious hymn of worship. It's soul lifting and edifying.

Blessed. be the name of the Lord!!! Thank You Jesus for You are the only wise. Your ways are past findings out. You are the invisible God. The unchanging changer. You cannot change neither can you fail. We worship you our God, You are worthy to be praised. You will be our God forever. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. All blessings!!!
Almighty God I thank You for all the things that You have done for me, my bosses, enemies, love once and family. GIORY BE TO YOUR NAME. PLEASE make me a new person.
Lying in my hospital bed, I just wanna praise God because He knows and it's well with me. I love ‚ù§ You soo.... Much!
I just woke up with this song in mind. Our immortal God reigns forever may all glory and majesty be ascribed unto Him now and ever more. Amen.

This song takes me right into the presence of God anytime I hear it. It's so full of Spirit and reintroduces me to God's supreme majesty anytime I hear. I just wish we all on earth would witness God truly, in one instant, as it should be! He is pure Love...His essence is light!
This has been my favourite hymn since my childhood. And as I'm preparing for my wedding, I have chosen it as a processional hymn to worship God who has kept me till this moment.

As teenager going to high school in Mandeville, Jamaica I have alway loved this hymn. Not to mention Mr. Gayle playing the piano in the mornings at devotion. And now even when I'm having my devotions this song still minister to my soul.

What a joy to read the messages here, to read the heart-felt messages of my brothers and sisters around the world that express their gratitude, love ad adoration of You dear Lord, the immortal, invisible, God only wise.

Lord forgive us all...My heart is weeping I just cannot comprehend such hatred. You asked us call people unto You but we just continue to chase them away from You. Becoz of their beliefs, culture, religion we keep on pointing fingers and call them names becoz of their tattoos bodies. We spit at them, we judge them so badly in so many ways because they are gay. Lord I know this is not what You called us to do my heart is sore I was one of them I ask for your forgiveness.They are ppl, You created them as You have created us. We are no better than them but we just keep on firing on them for no reason and stand tall like goliath instead of drawing them to You. Today make us what You called us here to spread the gospel (good news) That there is hope in You oh Lord. We are all sinners infront of Your eyes, we are no better .Give us all the spirit of obedience in Jesus name, Amen.
Our Father, King of kings shall live forever and ever, Amen.

Thank You Jesus for You are the only wise. Your ways are past findings out. You are the invisible God. The unchanging changer. You cannot change neither can you fail. We worship you our God, You are worthy to be praised. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!

I just returned from work at 11.30pm. As I sat down to relax after praying, this timeless hymn flooded my soul from stanza 4. Great Father of glory Pure Father of light. Oh what a blissful evening I'm having here. I thank God for His bounteous grace. To Him alone be all praises.
Almighty Father. We give You thanks.You are indeed immortal. Praise be to Your name.
Awesome hymn. Indeed our God is indescribable. Halleluyah!!!
Wonderful and uplifting hymn! We sang this in our night devotion and it ushered the presence of God in our midst!
There is no true King but Jesus!

Indeed my God is immortal. Recently it was announced that the Olu of Warri is dead and many other kings and presidents all around the world, but my God remains forever His kingdom is forever thank God I am in that kingdom. Thank You Jesus.

Lord indeed You're awesome. Your great and mighty works are beyond imagination. You sit upon the heavens and make the earth Your foot stool. You're higher than the highest, stronger than the strongest, deeper than the deepest. You're glorious most holy. Excellent is Your name. I love You Jesus.
Than God for Hymns through His prophets. It uplifts the soul, feeds, yearns and reminds that there is only true One and only God indeed.
He is immortal, invisible, only truely wise, ancient of days, my true and only life. All praise I will forever render.
Love this magnificent hymn. Each week we include a hymn in our time of worship and I can't wait to include this.
This hymn always takes me "there"!!!
Awesome hymn

Awesome in depth and meaning. As a child I just sang these hymns in church and school assemblies but now as an adult they come with so much meaning one can't help but ponder and meditate upon the awesomeness of this All-Mighty God. Awesome!

AWESOME INSPIRATIONAL This Song Brings Back Memories Of Sunday Schooling; Back Then My Parents Encouraged Me In A "Disciplinarian" Way To Attend Sunday School üè´ Reading üìñ And Singing üé∂ Hymns, Digesting The Word Of GOD, Are One Of The Very Many Things We Do BUT NOW I SEE THE BENEFITS OF KNOWING CHRIST THEN, HAS SET A "ROCK SOLID" FOUNDATION, WHICH NOW MAKES ME: *FEARLESS IN SUFFERINGS, TORTURE etc *MORE THAN A CONQUEROR IN CHRIST This Is Why The Scripture Says: "BRING UP YOUR CHILDREN IN THE WAY OF THE LORD AND THEY SHALL NOT DEPART FROM IT" PROVERB 22:6 ‚ÄúTrain up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it‚Äù THE WISDOM IMPERTED THEN {over 30 years ago} IS STILL HELPING ME DEAL WITH A "HATEFUL" WORLD "WEAPONS OF OUR WARFARE" HAS HELPED ME DEAL WITH ALL FORMS OF "CRIMES AGAINST HUMANITY" "FRUITS OF THE SPIRIT" HAS HELPED ME IN HUMILITY AND HOW TO LOVE THOSE WHO CONTINUE TO SHOW HATRED "SONGS & HYMNS" HAS HELPED ME TO SING PRAISES TO MY "ANCIENT OF DAYS" AND GIVING HIM THE HIGHEST PRAISE, HALLELUJAH üôå
A wonderful hymn with powerful and thought provoking lyrics.
Beautiful, and Awesome song, am so blessed hearing a song like this in my generation. Truly Jesus Christ is the only wise God and the true life of all. Amen.
This great hymn is very touchy. Verses 1and 3 especially. For those who believe that the world belongs to them, let them meditate on verse 3 and they will have a rethink.

The name of the Lord is a strong tower...Forever shall His praise remain in my mouth for He is my only refuge...I reverence the Holy One forevermore...He is in control. Beautiful song extolling the Majesty of the Almighty God!
This is the most wondrous song I've ever listened to.
Most blessed, most glorious, truely HE is the Ancient of Days, Almighty, victorious, Thy great name we praise. He has done what no man can do for me & my family, Praise His Holy name.
I am just coming into the knowledge of this hymn, and it is so touching.. simple tune, yet powerful words.

Walter Smith must have written this Hymn from the audible voice of God. I slept and woke up this morning to found out that the same God "Immortal and Invisible" l left to sleep still present in my waking up ...
This has become one of my favourite hymns. Thanks for posting these lyrics. Was at work and just thought of this hymn.
This is what is Godly music, for worship. today's music has followed the secular music rhythm full of dancing, pride and unGodly practices, which are not gifted from the Holy Spirit.

Today's song composers are not in tune with God (they have little or no intimacy with God), and thus their songs expire. But songs like these that are made out of mutual relationship with God... where simple words end up making complex meanings; how can this song expire? I can't wait to be in Heaven!
This is a song that gears me up when I'm in a difficult situation. It's a song that every Christian must sing when they woke up early in the morning or before going to bed. I LOVE YOU JESUS.
In my deepest thought and hopelessness; this hymn strengthens me knowing that God who my eyes can't see, the ancient of days is with me. My soul be at peace.
This song has unbeatable praise.
The crystal truth remains that GOD is the only wise being. This hymn strengthens faith and rekindles hope. If you listen to its lyrics or sing it convincingly, it gives joy!
I remember the 1st time I sang this song, today as I listen it make me aware of the mercy I received from the immortal God. Thank You, Jesus.
Most glorious most blessed the ancient of days, Almighty victorious Thy great name we praise. Awesome and inspirational song! Worthy of use in regular worship.

Planning a service for old people with dementia and this hymn came to mind. As I heard it played and read the words again I remembered singing it standing with my family as a small child. It is still fresh and stirring and true. We will be singing it in the Care Home on Sunday and some old people who do not usually even speak will look up and begin to join in. Writing this in tears... Thanks be to God for this great hymn.

Lovely! But could you delete the comma after 'high soaring above', please? the writer is saying: 'Thy justice [is] like mountains high soaring above the clouds, which are fountains of goodness and love.'
When I hear a Welsh melody....there is a deep stirring in my soul and kinship has somehow been linked again.

Any time I listen to this, I get a very good sense of how awesome God is....No matter what happens or does not happen to me does not makes Him less of who He is. He is ALMIGHTY....nothing escapes His attention.
This song is a masterpiece; none can be compared to it. It brings me closer to heaven anytime I hear it around.
I so love the hymns of old. Most were inspired by the Holy Spirit. I don't always enjoy the modernistic songs. Some times the words are not biblical. Love love the organ and hymns.

Awesome! A highly spirit-lifting hymn. A hymn that has kept me going, putting courage and zeal when things seems hazy; and making me to believe even more stronger the existence of God and even His Supremacy. I call it God's best meal.

This is the greatest celestial song ever.It perfectly capture the true nature and person of God.It is a song that sustain my Christian life and it shall be song at my funeral. No other song composed by man will ever beat it. It is immortal.
Awesome. The song depicts the very essence on God! "We blossom and flourish as leaves on the tree, And wither and perish, but nought changeth Thee." My favourite part.

"Unresting, unhasting, and silent as light, Nor wanting, nor wasting, Thou rulest in might." "Wait for the Lord, be strong and let your heart take courage, yes, wait for the Lord." In seasons when I'm tempted not to wait for the Lord, this song has reminded me that He is not in a hurry. Yet He IS working! His timing is perfect!
Hair raising hymn. I certainly believe that God's Spirit arises when this song comes on! God bless you!
Practicing piano for this hymn right now. Thank you for posting lyrics that are not on my score. Wonderful is His Name.

This is really a lovely hymn. It is one of the hymns I sing with my family during our devotion. Frantically, hymns does the magic for me when I am in low spirit to pray. Thank you for hosting this on web.
Sweet song I will like to dedicate to my Father on Father's Day . Thanks for giving us these sweet songs on your website. God bless.
I love this song so much. My church uses it for worship. It exhort God so much.
One of the best. It was also a graduation song, a touching song. All the words are true of its nature. I love this song.
